channel.title: [Outdated] Double kill bug
channel.description:
####What happened?
Both a possessor and an assassin killed the same Butler.
It showed [12] died by a Possessor and an assassin, and went through the phases (i.e. [12] was a butler)
THEN
It then showed [12] died by an assassin (ONLY, instead of both, but regardless this line trigged too) and went through the phases again. ([12] was a butler)
####What was SUPPOSED to happen?
The only thing that should show up is the first line.
####Steps to reproduce:
Both roles stated above kill the same target.
####Comments:
